Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add BRC parser unit tests and fix ESLint warnings

- Add 25 unit tests for BRC parser service covering AAR 500-byte format,
  Julian date parsing, job codes extraction, and cost calculations
- Fix ESLint warnings in frontend by using useCallback for fetchRules
- Fix anonymous default export warning in api.ts
- Update Phase 9 task tracking to mark BRC tests as complete

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(__NEW_LINE_201bd309a30d8851__ echo "=== Testing ACFX600002 \(Carbon, Rubber lined\) ===")

Bash(git -C "C:/Users/jshch/Web-Architecture-Design/Railsync" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add user management, analytics dashboard, mobile views, and shop drawer

- User management: roles \(admin/operator/viewer\), granular permissions,
  user groups, customer portal support with migration 026
- Analytics dashboard: capacity forecasting, cost trends, operations KPIs,
  demand forecasting with 4-tab UI
- Mobile responsive: bottom nav bar, touch-friendly cards for shops/cars,
  responsive data view component
- Shop details drawer: slide-out panel with backlog, capacity, capabilities
- Updated navigation with Analytics link

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:/Users/jshch/Web-Architecture-Design/Railsync" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix user management migration to use UUID for customer_id

customers.id is UUID, not INTEGER. Updated migration, service, and
controller to use correct types for customer_id foreign key references
and view joins to use customer_name column.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "C:/Users/jshch/Web-Architecture-Design/Railsync" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refine Maintenance Budget module to match spec

- Promote summary cards above tabs so they''re always visible
- Add percentage available text to Remaining card
- Update default $/Car/Month from $150 to $450
- Add segment filter dropdown to Service Events section
- Convert Add Event from inline row to modal dialog with
  fleet segment and notes fields
- Simplify BudgetOverview: remove redundant sub-tabs and summary
  cards, replace with focused budget health view featuring
  monthly trend chart and event type breakdown

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
